name: Strange Friends - Volume 1
description:
Introduction

You don't remember much of the last night.

Well, you don't remember much of the last... forever. 

It seems like you have some sort of really weird amnesia.

Not only that, but you start to attract some... strange people.

Episode 1 - Of cats and Cataclysms

You awake near a town with complete amnesia. The only things you have is a small sack filled with coins, and a small paper note with some cryptic directions.

You try to follow them, and along the way you find... a small cat child.

His name is Cyrrit. He's scared, alone and a little hungry. Just like you.

You decide to take him with you, and take care for him, while trying to figure out, what happened last night.

Features:
  • Make choices! Whatever you choose, it will have some consequences later!
  • Make friends! Who knows? Maybe if you help Cyrrit he will help you?
  • Incredibly looking graphics! And also some backgrounds too.
  • Achievement system. That's cool now, right?
  • Several endings, that depend on choices you make. 
  • Secrets!
  • Cats!
  • If enough people will donate to this game I will make a t-shirt of it. 
  • SOME BACKGROUNDS MIGHT BE UNIFINISHED, PLEASE FORGIVE ME
THE MOST IMPORTANT PART OF THIS THING. YOU SHOULD REALLY READ THIS PART.

This game wouldn't be possible without Wheatu! Show her some love, or I'll show you the door.
